milestones.title: Started Writing Blogs
milestones.description: I began sharing my programming journey and tips and tricks related to web development through blogging. I hope to help others learn and improve their skills in the field.

milestones.title: Started Full time Freelancing
milestones.description: I started freelancing as a full-time Fullstack web developer in January 2022. I have gained experience in Web Development through both part-time and full-time freelancing. I am able to work independently and deliver high-quality results within tight deadlines, having the autonomy to manage my own time and workload.

milestones.title: Contributed to open source for the first time
milestones.description: The project I contributed to is designed to assist developers in troubleshooting errors that occur while running git commands. It provides users with helpful solutions to address specific errors.
